```js
    $ ember new BookExample

    ```

```js
    $ cd BookExample
    $ ember install ember-cli-mirage
    $ ember g factory book

    ```

```js
    $ ember g model book title:string author:string year:date
    $ ember g adapter application
    $ ember g route books
    $ ember g route application

    ```

```js // app/templates/books.hbs {{outlet}}
Author: {{model.author}}
Year: {{model.year}}
```

```js
    $ ember g route new
    $ ember g controller books
    $ ember g controller new
    $ ember g controller application

    ```

```js // app/templates/new.hbs {{outlet}} title: {{input value=info.title size='15'}}
Author: {{input value=info.author size='15'}}
Year: {{input value=info.year size='35'}}

```

```js // app/templates/books.hbs {{outlet}}
title: {{input value=model.title size='15'}}
Author: {{input value=model.author size='15'}}
Year: {{input value=model.year size='35'}}

```

```js
    $ ember install ember-cli-mirage
    $ ember g model student name:string age:number
    $ ember g route index
    $ ember g adapter application
    $ ember g fixture students

    ```

```js // app/templates/index.hbs {{#each model as |student|}} Name: {{student.name}}
age: {{student.age}}
{{/each}}
```

```js
    $ ember g serializer application

    ```

```js
    $ ember install ember-cli-mirage
    $ ember g model instructor
    $ ember g model class
    $ ember g route index
    $ ember g helper addone
    $ ember g adapter application
    $ ember g fixture classes
    $ ember g fixture instructors

    ```
